The easy way to send, receive, store and trade digital currencies.
Click Show Pairing Code to reveal a QR Code, a square black & white barcode. Scan the code with your camera.
You should always pair or login if you have access to your Wallet ID and password. Recovering your funds will create a new Wallet ID. Would you like to continue?
Enter your 12 backup words with spaces to recover your funds & transactions
Invalid backup phrase. Please try again

This will leave the app and take you to your browser. Continue?
The selected password is too weak to secure your funds. We strongly suggest you select a different one. Would you like to define a new password?

Your address has been imported successfully. Optionally assign a friendly display name to this address.

Enhanced privacy through hierarchical deterministic addresses.
Customize the way you organize your Bitcoin in your Blockchain Wallet.
Hey, we\'ve added these new features to your Blockchain wallet:
Your wallet is upgrading, please be patient this may take some time depending on the size and age of your wallet.
You are now running the most secure and private Blockchain Wallet. You may continue to your wallet now.
There was an error upgrading your wallet. Please try again later.
Your Blockchain Wallet installation is incomplete. Please re-pair your wallet or create a new one.
You are about to receive bitcoin to a non-spendable address. You can only spend these funds if you have access to the private key. Continue?
The camera is currently opened by another application. Please close other application and try again.
Your password has been changed, please re-pair your wallet

Your verified email address is used to send login codes when suspicious or unusual activity is detected, to remind you of your wallet login ID, and to send bitcoin payment alerts when you receive funds.

Your device appears to be rooted. Be advised that storing funds on a rooted device is unsafe and, in addition, can cause stability issues. If you continue to use our Bitcoin wallet on this device we recommend that you use double encryption on your Blockchain account.
Your wallet already contains this address.
We are unable to connect to the host to establish a secure connection. Please verify your network connection and device before continuing.

This item has been archived, and is inaccessible in the mobile app experience. Though you cannot send funds from this item, any funds will remain safe. Simply unarchive this item to start using it again.
This item is not archived. Archive this item if you do NOT want to use it anymore. Your funds will remain safe, and you can unarchive it at anytime.
This item is set as your default and can\'t be archived.
Your xPub is an advanced feature that contains all of your public addresses.
Sharing your xPub authorizes others to track your transaction history. As authorized persons may be able to disrupt you from accessing your wallet, only share your xPub with people you trust.
Give this new wallet a name.
Give this new wallet a name.
Are you sure you want to archive this item?
Are you sure you want to unarchive this item?
This action requires the private key for the Bitcoin address %1$s. Please scan the QR code.

You are about to import a non-spendable address, an address (or public key script) stored in the wallet without the corresponding private key. This means that the funds can be spent ONLY if you have the private key stored elsewhere. If you do not have the private key stored, do NOT instruct anyone to send you bitcoin to the non-spendable address.\n\nThese options are recommended for advanced users only. Continue?
NOTE: The scanned private key does not correspond to your non-spendable address. To spend your funds from this address, please scan the correct private key.

If you are a merchant, show your xPub and use the Blockchain Merchant app to receive funds safely and privately.\n\nKeep your xPub private. Someone with access to your xPub will be able to see all your funds and transactions.
Keep your xPub private. Someone with access to your xPub will be able to see all your funds and transactions.
This is a non-spendable address. To spend your funds from this wallet, please scan your private key.

Looks like you have some bitcoins in imported addresses. Imported addresses are not backed up by your Backup Phrase. To secure these funds, we recommend transferring these balances to include in your backup.
The Bitcoin mining network is currently experiencing a high volume of activity, resulting in recommended fees that are higher than usual.
Please disable 2-step Verification via SMS in the security settings first.
Please login to your wallet in the web browser to disable 2FA.
Error updating settings, please try again
Write external storage and camera are required to upload KYC documents.
We have sent your mobile phone an SMS message with a verification code. Enter the code to verify your mobile phone number.
Your mobile phone can be used to enable two-factor authentication, helping to secure your wallet from unauthorized access.
Block IP addresses that are known to be part of the Tor anonymizing network. The Tor network is frequently used by hackers attempting to access Blockchain user\'s wallets.
Some screens within the application can display sensitive data. Other applications will be able to access these screenshots.

Your Blockchain Wallet never communicates your password to our servers. This means we have no idea what your password is and we cannot reset it if you forget it. Create a memorable password hint that we can send to your verified email address in case you forget your password.

Your password is never shared with our servers, which means we cannot help reset your password if you forget it. Make sure you backup your funds from the side menu which can restore access to your wallet in the event of a lost password.
We have sent your email address a verification link. Click the link to verify your email address.
Get notified when you receive bitcoin.
Protect your wallet from unauthorized access by enabling 2-Step Verification.

Protect your wallet from unauthorized access by enabling 2-Step Verification. You can choose to use your mobile phone number to secure your wallet. This code will be requested when you try to access your wallet via the web browser.\n\nIn order to use other authentication methods instead, please login to our web wallet at %1$s
Enjoying the Blockchain Wallet? Please take a moment to leave a review in Google Play and let others know about it.
Using your computer\'s camera, scan the QR code below.
Keep this code hidden until you\'re ready.
Keep this code safe!\nDo not share with others.
Please send%1$s BTC to the Bitcoin address %2$s.
Please send ETH to the Ether address %1$s.
Please send PAX to the USD PAX address %1$s.
Please send BCH to the Bitcoin Cash address %1$s.
Please send XLM to the Stellar address %1$s.
Tap to copy this address. Share it with the sender via email or text.
The PIN you have selected is extremely common and may be easily guessed by someone with access to your phone within 3 tries. Would you like to use this PIN anyway?
You have logged out or there was an error decrypting your wallet. Enter your password below to login.
If you would like to forget this wallet and start over, press \'Forget Wallet\'.
This will erase all wallet data on this device. Please confirm you have your wallet information saved elsewhere otherwise any bitcoin in this wallet will be inaccessible!!
Unable to connect to server. Please try again later.
This is an oversized bitcoin transaction. Your wallet needs to consolidate many smaller payments you\'ve received in the past. This requires a relatively high fee in order to be confirmed quickly.
Be careful! Revealing this text allows your password to be copied to the clipboard, which can then be read by all applications on your device. Also be aware of people standing behind you!
Enable notifications to receive a popup notification whenever you receive bitcoin.
May be at risk for a double spend.

For your security, Blockchain does not keep any passwords on file. The following 12 word Backup Phrase will give you access to your funds in case you lose your password. Be sure to write it on a piece of paper and to keep it somewhere safe and secure.
It is important to make sure you write down your words exactly as they appear here and in this order.

You can use your Backup Phrase to restore your funds if you lose your password. Anyone with access to your Backup Phrase can access your funds so remember to keep it offline somewhere safe and secure.
Enter the following words from your Backup Phrase to complete the backup process.
Use your fingerprint for faster, easier access to your wallet.\n\nConfirm fingerprint to continue
Are you sure you want to disable fingerprint login?
No fingerprints have been registered to this device yet. Do you want to register a fingerprint now?
Either the fingerprints stored on this device have changed or the keyguard has been disabled
There have been too many failed attempts in the last 30 minutes. Please attempt setup again later.

Reveal a receive address when you swipe left on the PIN screen, making receiving funds even faster.

Use fingerprint login instead of your PIN to authenticate and access your wallet.

Here are a few tips to get your wallet up and running. We\'ll also help you make sure everything is secure.

Not enough ETH for transaction fees

Stellar requires that all Stellar accounts hold a minimum balance of lumens, or XLM. This means you cannot send a balance out of your Stellar Wallet that would leave your Stellar Wallet with less than the minimum balance. This also means that in order to send XLM to a new Stellar account, you must send enough XLM to meet the minimum balance requirement. The current minimum balance requirement is 1 XLM.
You can read more information about Stellar\'s minimum balance requirement at Stellar.org
Learn about Stellarâs minimum balance requirement
Add a Memo to avoid losing funds or use Swap to exchange in this wallet.
